Wish he was obligated to make it funny: RT @Zap2itRick: Paul Lee says as a Brit, he's...obligated to do a cross-dressing show, "Work It."

Just once, I'd like to have an exec answer one of these "Why did you do this?" question with "Well, I practice the dark arts." #tcas11

ABC has confirmed DESPERATE HOUSEWIVES is ending after the coming season. Start developing your Felicity Huffman vehicles. #tcas11

Remember when Teri Hatcher won a bunch of acting awards for no real reason? #memories #tcas11
